ComicInfo.Summary: And the Measure of a Man Is... Death!: Hulk is still wandering around the Sahara desert trying to figure out how to get home when he is attacked by the Israeli army. Faring no better than their American counterparts, the Israelis watch helplessly as Hulk hitches a ride on a plane headed for the U.S.. Meanwhile, as Ross oversees construction of the new Project: Greenskin, Jim comes to him with information about the Leader's sinister plans to replace key people, including the president, with androids.
ComicInfo.Tags: United States Army,Richard Nixon,Leader,Betty Ross,Hulk,Thunderbolt Ross,Doc Samson,Glenn Talbot,United States Secret Service,Project Greenskin Base,New Mexico,Jim Wilson,Spiro Agnew
